column4: Okay, i have a question. Is there any way to optimise ubuntu to run on my current setup? (800mhz celeron, 512 sdram, crappy vga onboard graphics)

xubuntu to start not necessarily because xfce is sooo much lighter but the apps included are lighter than equivalent ubuntu apps.  ubuntu isnt really the ideal distro if youre really wanting to tweak though
do you have regular ubuntu installed atm?
